original_text: Think about how God's prophets were also patient. They spoke messages on behalf of the Lord. Many troubles happened to them but they were patient. So, my Christian friends, you should copy their example.
korean_text: 형제들아 주의 이름으로 말한 선지자들을 고난과 오래 참음의 본으로 삼으라

sentences.original_text: Think about how God's prophets were also patient
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 예언자들도 어떻게 인내했는지 생각해 보세요

sentences.original_text: They spoke messages on behalf of the Lord
